name: Promotion Class: Paladin
description:
Role: Healing

This well-armored holy warrior excels at healing their allies.

Stat Adjustments:
Support Power +600
Resist All +300
Final Mitigation Cap +15%

Traits Granted:
Great Sword Mastery
Plate Armor Proficiency

Enhancements:
Holy Warrior: Now has a reduced cooldown and heals lowest health in Group. Zealotry gains +50%.
Devotion: Now scales with Support Power and cleanses all Damage Over Time effects.
Divine Light: Now has no pip cost.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Paladin promotion class and prevents access to the Vindicator and Fury promotion classes.
